code: const sum = (a, b) => a + b; console.log(sum(2, 3));
const factorial = n => n <= 1 ? 1 : n * factorial(n-1); console.log(factorial(5));
def fibonacci(n): return n if n <= 1 else fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2); print(fibonacci(10))
class Test; def greet; 'Hello from class'; end; end; puts Test.new.greet
